channel.title: Blog on Thinkering: Written Down
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Thinkering: Written Down

item.title: Teams - Debugging Tab
item.description: Introduction Teams Tab is one of the integration point in Microsoft Teams. It allows a website to be embedded as iframe that was declared in Teams app manifest. It can be added as personal tab, group chat or channels tab inside a team. The tab could also be Teams-context aware using Teams JS SDK. In this post, I wanted to share about how do you use various common tools to debug Teams Tab application.

item.title: Teams - DeepLink in Adaptive Cards
item.description: Introduction In this post we’ll be looking at how to create interactive card that allows you to create an adaptive card with deeplink buttons. One of the use case for this is that for eg: a chatbot sends you a notification with phone number and you would like to press on the button to make a call directly to that person. Same thing for a chat as well. Especially for Teams Mobile user.
